Description.English: Adds more disasters. Currently Volcano and some kind of Thunderstorm moving over the map and damaging buildings.
Description.German: Fügt Katastrophen hinzu. Aktuell einen Vulkan und einen sich über die Karte bewegenen Gewittersturm.

KnownIssues.English: 1) If an island is lost while the Eruption is active, the invisible helper-Quest and therefore the Eruption of volcano is ended.
2) The forced CeaseFire on an island after a War makes all buildings on the island not targetable by any attacks, even from Volcano.
